channel.title: WTAT 1 on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen
channel.description: Recent content in WTAT 1 on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen

item.title: WTAT1 Literature
item.description:
Literature and Resources

Textbook for Node, Express and Mongo

  • Wexler, Jonathan (2019): Get Programming with Node.js. Shelter Island: Manning.
    • Source Code for this book on Github.

JavaScript

  • Mozilla Developer Network - JavaScript Guide
  • Eloquent JavaScript 3rd Edition
  • JavaScript Tutorial w3schools

Vue

  • Documentation on vue.js site - concrete parts will be assigned to the vue sprints

Agile Development and Scrum:

  • Scrum Foundations eLearning Series on scrumalliance.org
  • The Scrum Guide

item.title: WTAT1 Schedule Summer Term 2021
item.description:
This is to be read as follows: For example: During Week 2 of the term - which is Calendar Week 15 - you need to study the agile and tech topic, first individually and then within the team. Furthermore, you need to work on the corresponding sprint and turn in the sprint report by Friday, 22:00

Reading Material for the Tech Topics can be found in Moodle. For the Agile Topics, read the scrum guides and watch these short videos.
